DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct group 52 patient sex , age 38-86 year ( mean 57.39 ; SD-11.5 ) plantar calcaneal spur confirm X-ray image . Patients treat Department Physical Medicine Rehabilitation Day Unit University Hospital im . WAM - Central Veterans Hospital Lodz Municipal Health Clinic Andrespol . In order compare effectiveness two form physiotherapy , ultrasound radial shock wave therapy , patient randomly assign ( use simple randomization ) two group : - Group 1 - ultrasound therapy group : 22 patient age 38-86 year ( mean 58.64 ; SD-12.99 ) , - Group 2 - radial shock wave group : 30 patient age 40-71 year ( mean 56.13 ; SD-10.02 ) . Ultrasound ( US ) perform BTL 5840 S device , use labile technique , target calcaneal tumor attachment plantar aponeurosis ( pain point ) ; power set 1,5 W/cm2 , 80 % fill factor , frequency 1 MHz ( head 4cm2 ) . The duration single treatment four minute , couple substance use paraffin oil . Treatment session perform daily Monday Friday period two week series 10 treatment . The shock wave therapy ( SWT ) perform affected area use BTL-5000 SWT device connect 15 mm diameter applicator accord producer 's recommendation ; therapy , 2000 stroke apply frequency 10 Hz capacity 2.5 bar . Therapy take place two week series 6 treatment two-day interval treatment . In addition , patient underwent kinesitherapy - exercise strengthen muscle bend plantar supinate foot improve mobility foot maintain normal longitudinal arch foot . SPR orthopedic insert pit painful area use support longitudinal foot arch relieve medial ridge calcaneal tumor . In patient , pain intensity assess three time : therapy , first second week treatment . A modified form Laitinen indicator pain question-shem use [ 12 ] . On basis subjective feeling , patient evaluate pain intensity , frequency occurrence , use analgesic , impact pain physical activity . In addition , pain intensity also assess Huskisson visual - analogue scale ( VAS ) [ 13 ] ; patient mark point 100 mm line correspond current pain sensation - result give millimeter . The result analyze Student 's t-test dependent independent test , significance level p < 0.05 . The result present arithmetic mean standard deviation .
